Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Atellica® CH Vancomycin and Phencyclidine assays for quantitative vancomycin measurement in serum/plasma and qualitative/semiquantitative PCP detection in urine using immunoassay on Atellica CI Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Atellica® CH Vancomycin assay is for quantitative measurement of vancomycin in serum and plasma (lithium heparin) to aid diagnosis, overdose management, and therapeutic monitoring; Atellica® CH Phencyclidine assay is for qualitative or semiquantitative detection of PCP in human urine, providing a preliminary result requiring confirmation by a specific chemical method such as GC/MS.
